message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be valuable to you. Our initial offer for this exceptional item is $950000.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within a budget of $850000. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.
Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your budget considerations. Our counteroffer for the product is $875000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $860000 for the product.
Considering your latest proposal, Alice is proposing a counteroffer of $880000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of my budget, I would like to propose a price of $870000 for the product.
Taking into account your latest offer, Alice proposes a counteroffer of $885000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $875000 for the product.
Considering your latest proposal, Alice proposes a counteroffer of $890000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget. I would like to propose a final price of $880000 for the product.
